name: Pigeon Simulator (Vitaliy Odarchenko)
description:
Pigeon - the best city bird flight simulator 3D!
Have you ever imagined what it consists of, and life of the pigeon looks like a city with bird's-eye view?
Now you have the chance to experience the life of city pigeon.
Pigeon simulator is very easy to use.
1. Select the Pigeon mission you want to complete
2. Use the joystick to control the Pigeon flight
3. Use the attack button to attack people by your Pigeon
4. Enjoy the pigeon flight!
Download Pigeon 3D and play now!
